intro: When I throw you a fruit or vegetable, say Slice and Dice! If it's milk or yogurt, say Splash a dash! If ice, say Punch and crunch! And if I accidentally throw you a kitchen utensil, say Stop, don't drop!! to block it.
0.shouldRunDemoPhrase: Should Sensei and I show you what to do?
0.readyToStartPhrase: Now it’s your turn, Ben’s friend. Ready to start?
